data.name: Kabhi strings to kabhi numbers, yeh kya mamla hai?
Agar hamein khud kuch btana ho code ko?
Kabhi aise toh kabhi waise? Yaani Kabhi if, Kabhi else
Aur cheezon ki tulna kaise karein?
Ek saath zyada saari cheezon ki tulna?
Baar baar ek hi code kaise run karen?
Baar baar dekho! Hazaar baar dekho
Arrays mein cheezon ko daalte aur nikalte kaise hain?
Objects ke baare mein seekhte hain
Ek baar karo! Anek baar karvao. Functions ka dhamaal
Mera code kahan raj karta hai aur kahan nahi?
